questions.question: Among biometric verification technologies, fingerprint scanning is probably the best as it ……………….. good performance and is affordable in terms of price.
Glaciers are usually found in high altitudes and latitudes …………….. large amounts of snow build up and freeze into ice.
The amplifier in a radio strengthens the radio waves it receives, and the speaker changes them back into the original sound waves that ……………. into the microphone in the studio.
Kosovo, a former territory of Serbia, ………………… itself a sovereign and independent state in February
During the Ottoman rule, Christian Serbs in Kosovo emigrated and the region ……………….. increasingly more populated by Albanians who were largely Muslims.
